testcase.name: User should be able to login with valid user id and valid password
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch browser...................................................passed When User opens URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/admin"..............passed And User enters valid user id "admin@yourstore.com" and valid password "admin".passed When User clicks login button...............................................passed Then Page title should be "Dashboard / nopCommerce administration"..........passed When User click on logout button............................................passed Then Page title should be "Your store. Login"...............................passed And close browser...........................................................passed
